snippet: The journalist and author of "Culinary Intelligence: The Art of Eating Healthy (And Really Well)" will answer reader questions on how to relish the act of eating without sending your body into a tailspin.
abstract: The journalist and author of "Culinary Intelligence: The Art of Eating Healthy (And Really Well)" will answer reader questions on how to relish the act of eating without sending your body into a tailspin.

headline.main: Post Your Questions on Healthy (and Tasty) Eating
